post.body: I was planning 2 c Seven Pounds 2day but the line is 2 long, so Im going home 2 eat bread pudding lol
Just finished reading Alice Walker's "Possessing The Secret of Joy" - its a gr8 book!
We had a gr8 show! Now Im dancing @ Manchild's SOB's house music party with my friend Bryan - well actually Im not really dancing lol
Pre show gitters - wish me luck:)
So I figured out what 2 wear 2 tonite's gig (with the help of my roommate) - black suite, deep red shirt & green silt tie - I look good lol
Trying 2 figure out what 2 wear 2 tonite's gig @ the Brooklyn Society of Ethical Culture:)
Its snowing here in NYC - the first time for the year:)
Learning Final Cut Pro & editing concert footage from my Cornelia Street Cafe Show 4 youtube:)
I enjoyed a gr8 play @ the Signature Theater - "Home" & now Im looking @ Love Jones:-)
Learning from the Masters - Art Blakley & The Jazz Messengers: Live in '58
These lyrics have been in my head all day "You'll find that life is still worthwhile if you just smile"-:)
I'm looking at Bruce Lee in "Enter the Dragon":)
Im chatting Pattie - an incredible PR person who loves my music:-)
Im about 2 perform:-)
Im heading to Judson Memorial Church for the World AIDS day event - Out of the Darkness.
Waiting 4 my car - show tonight @ Brooklyn Society of Ethical Culture @ 9 pm
Maxwel is about to hit the stage @ the United Palace Theatre:-)
I love Nina Simone! -Watching her Live @ Montreux 1976...
Im at St. Nicks Pub in Harlem enjoying the beautiful Venus:-)
Im playing bingo 4 the first time:-) Its a little naughty, but its 4 a good cause - the Bronx Academy of Arts and Dance:-)
